description:
UPDATED April 2016: My Udemy courses have been taken by 1,000s of students and have been awarded 100s of positive reviews.

My “WHY” – You know that feeling you get when you help someone? I want to feel that way 1,000,000 times.

Come with me on a journey to generating 1000s of leads from social media marketing.

This course is about lead generation, nurturing and sales optimization. New leads are bread and butter for any business (online & offline). I will show you a step by step process that you can use to generate 1000s of new email leads for your business.

I run a marketing agency called iSocialYOU and I have managed 100s of lead generation campaigns for my clients including Chevy, Lexmark, Papa Murphy and many small medium businesses.

In this course you will learn things like..

  1. How to generate new email leads for your business
  2. How to make sales after proper lead nurturing
  3. How create your lead generation landing pages in less than 10min
  4. What tools, processes and systems you need for successful lead generation campaigns

I will share why most businesses fail at generation leads and sales and how you can avoid those failures. This course includes

  1. Over 25 video lectures
  2. Real life examples and case studies
  3. Demo of tools I used to generate 1,031 email leads for my client
  4. Demo of specific Facebook Ads you should be using to promote your campaign

Enroll now and I will see you on the inside!
title: Lead Generation: Get New Email Leads For Your Business
